segment.source: How to use the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page in IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to add links, web slices, and feeds to your custom browser package.
segment.target: How to use the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page in IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to add links, web slices, and feeds to your custom browser package.

segment.source: Use the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page of the Internet Explorer Administration Kit (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard lets you add:
segment.target: The Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page of the Internet Explorer Administration Kit (IEAK 11) Customization Wizard lets you add:

segment.source: Links.
segment.target: Links.

segment.source: Used so your employees can quickly connect with your important websites.
segment.target: Used so your employees can quickly connect with your important websites.

segment.source: These links can appear in the Links folder or on the Favorites Bar.
segment.target: These links can appear in the Links folder or on the Favorites Bar.

segment.source: Web Slices.
segment.target: Web Slices.

segment.source: Used so your employees can subscribe to a section of a webpage, tracking information as it changes, such as for weather reports, stock prices, or the progress of an auction item.
segment.target: Used so your employees can subscribe to a section of a webpage, tracking information as it changes, such as for weather reports, stock prices, or the progress of an auction item.

segment.source: Feeds.
segment.target: Feeds.

segment.source: Used so your employees can quickly access your recommended RSS feeds.
segment.target: Used so your employees can quickly access your recommended RSS feeds.

segment.source: While you can’t import a folder of RSS feeds, you can add new links.
segment.target: While you can’t import a folder of RSS feeds, you can add new links.

segment.source: Although we provide default items in the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds area, you can remove any of the items, add more items, or add new folders and links as part of your custom package.
segment.target: Although we provide default items in the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds area, you can remove any of the items, add more items, or add new folders and links as part of your custom package.

segment.source: The customizations you make on this page only apply to Internet Explorer for the desktop.
segment.target: The customizations you make on this page only apply to Internet Explorer for the desktop.

segment.source: To work with Favorites
segment.target: To work with Favorites

segment.source: To import your existing folder of links, pick Favorites, and then click Import.
segment.target: To import your existing folder of links, pick Favorites, and then click Import.

segment.source: Go to your existing link folder, most likely in the folder, and then click OK.
segment.target: Go to your existing link folder, most likely in the folder, and then click OK.

segment.source: The links are imported and added to the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page, beneath the Favorites folder.
segment.target: The links are imported and added to the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page, beneath the Favorites folder.

segment.source: To add a new favorite link, pick Favorites, and then click Add URL.
segment.target: To add a new favorite link, pick Favorites, and then click Add URL.

segment.source: The Details box appears.
segment.target: The Details box appears.

segment.source: Type the new link name in the Name box.
segment.target: Type the new link name in the Name box.

segment.source: Type the new URL in the URL box.
segment.target: Type the new URL in the URL box.

segment.source: Optionally, you can add a 16x16 pixel icon to your link by adding the location in the Icon box.
segment.target: Optionally, you can add a 16x16 pixel icon to your link by adding the location in the Icon box.

segment.source: Click OK.
segment.target: Click OK.

segment.source: To add a new Favorites folder, pick Favorites, and then click Add Folder.
segment.target: To add a new Favorites folder, pick Favorites, and then click Add Folder.

segment.source: The Details box appears.
segment.target: The Details box appears.

segment.source: Type the folder name into the Name box, and then click OK.
segment.target: Type the folder name into the Name box, and then click OK.

segment.source: Click Edit to change any of your new information, Test URL to test each of your links to make sure they go to the right place, or Remove to delete a Favorites item.
segment.target: Click Edit to change any of your new information, Test URL to test each of your links to make sure they go to the right place, or Remove to delete a Favorites item.

segment.source: If you have multiple Favorites links, you can update their order in the list.
segment.target: If you have multiple Favorites links, you can update their order in the list.

segment.source: Check the Add to the top of the list box, click the link you want to move, and then click Move Up or Move Down.
segment.target: Check the Add to the top of the list box, click the link you want to move, and then click Move Up or Move Down.

segment.source: Check the Disable IE Suggested Sites box to disable the Suggested Sites feature.
segment.target: Check the Disable IE Suggested Sites box to disable the Suggested Sites feature.

segment.source: By turning this on, your employees won’t receive suggested sites based on the sites that they visit.
segment.target: By turning this on, your employees won’t receive suggested sites based on the sites that they visit.

segment.source: Continue with the next procedures in this topic to add additional Favorites Bar or RSS Feeds links, or you can click Next to go to the Browsing Options page or Back to go to the Accelerators page.
segment.target: Continue with the next procedures in this topic to add additional Favorites Bar or RSS Feeds links, or you can click Next to go to the Browsing Options page or Back to go to the Accelerators page.

segment.source: To work with the Favorites Bar
segment.target: To work with the Favorites Bar

segment.source: To import your existing folder of links, pick Favorites Bar, and then click Import.
segment.target: To import your existing folder of links, pick Favorites Bar, and then click Import.

segment.source: Go to your existing link folder, most likely in the folder, and then click OK.
segment.target: Go to your existing link folder, most likely in the folder, and then click OK.

segment.source: The links are imported and added to the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page, beneath the Favorites Bar folder.
segment.target: The links are imported and added to the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds page, beneath the Favorites Bar folder.

segment.source: To add a new link to the Favorites Bar, pick Favorites Bar, and then click Add URL.
segment.target: To add a new link to the Favorites Bar, pick Favorites Bar, and then click Add URL.

segment.source: The Details box appears.
segment.target: The Details box appears.

segment.source: Type the new quick link name in the Name box.
segment.target: Type the new quick link name in the Name box.

segment.source: Type the new URL in the URL box.
segment.target: Type the new URL in the URL box.

segment.source: Optionally, you can add a 16x16 pixel icon to your link by adding the location in the Icon box.
segment.target: Optionally, you can add a 16x16 pixel icon to your link by adding the location in the Icon box.

segment.source: Pick whether your link is a simple Link, a Feed, or a Web Slice, and then click OK.
segment.target: Pick whether your link is a simple Link, a Feed, or a Web Slice, and then click OK.

segment.source: Click Edit to change any of your new information, Test URL to test each of your links to make sure they go to the right place, or Remove to delete a Favorites Bar item.
segment.target: Click Edit to change any of your new information, Test URL to test each of your links to make sure they go to the right place, or Remove to delete a Favorites Bar item.

segment.source: If you have multiple Favorites Bar links, you can update their order in the list.
segment.target: If you have multiple Favorites Bar links, you can update their order in the list.

segment.source: Check the Add to the top of the list box, click the link you want to move, and then click Move Up or Move Down.
segment.target: Check the Add to the top of the list box, click the link you want to move, and then click Move Up or Move Down.

segment.source: Check the Disable IE Suggested Sites box to disable the Suggested Sites feature.
segment.target: Check the Disable IE Suggested Sites box to disable the Suggested Sites feature.

segment.source: By turning this on, your employees won’t receive suggested sites based on the sites that they visit.
segment.target: By turning this on, your employees won’t receive suggested sites based on the sites that they visit.

segment.source: Continue with the next procedures in this topic to add additional Favorites or RSS Feeds links, or you can click Next to go to the Browsing Options page or Back to go to the Accelerators page.
segment.target: Continue with the next procedures in this topic to add additional Favorites or RSS Feeds links, or you can click Next to go to the Browsing Options page or Back to go to the Accelerators page.

segment.source: To work with RSS Feeds
segment.target: To work with RSS Feeds

segment.source: To add a new link to the RSS Feeds, pick Favorites Bar, and then click Add URL.
segment.target: To add a new link to the RSS Feeds, pick Favorites Bar, and then click Add URL.

segment.source: The Details box appears.
segment.target: The Details box appears.

segment.source: Type the new link name in the Name box.
segment.target: Type the new link name in the Name box.

segment.source: Type the new URL in the URL box, and then click OK.
segment.target: Type the new URL in the URL box, and then click OK.

segment.source: Click Edit to change any of your new information, Test URL to test each of your links to make sure they go to the right place, or Remove to delete a RSS Feeds item.
segment.target: Click Edit to change any of your new information, Test URL to test each of your links to make sure they go to the right place, or Remove to delete a RSS Feeds item.

segment.source: If you have multiple RSS Feeds links, you can update their order in the list.
segment.target: If you have multiple RSS Feeds links, you can update their order in the list.

segment.source: Check the Add to the top of the list box, click the link you want to move, and then click Move Up or Move Down.
segment.target: Check the Add to the top of the list box, click the link you want to move, and then click Move Up or Move Down.

segment.source: Check the Disable IE Suggested Sites box to disable the Suggested Sites feature.
segment.target: Check the Disable IE Suggested Sites box to disable the Suggested Sites feature.

segment.source: By turning this on, your employees won’t receive suggested sites based on the sites that they visit.
segment.target: By turning this on, your employees won’t receive suggested sites based on the sites that they visit.

segment.source: Continue with the next procedures in this topic to add additional Favorites or Favorites Bar links, or you can click Next to go to the Browsing Options page or Back to go to the Accelerators page.
segment.target: Continue with the next procedures in this topic to add additional Favorites or Favorites Bar links, or you can click Next to go to the Browsing Options page or Back to go to the Accelerators page.
